conclusion: Analyze forces on the ball and child using geometry and angles to find the ratio of tension to force.
Schematic of playground activity with ball on guide rail, rope at angle β, and masses m1 and m2.
Identify forces: Tension (T) in rope and force (F) by pillow on child.
Consider angles α and β for force analysis.
Use trigonometry: T cos β balances force F.
Express relationship: T cos β = F.
Negligible ball mass implies T = F.
Ratio of tension to force is 1:1.
Calculate ratio: Tension (T) to force (F) ratio = 1.
